attributes.action: STOP DICTATING AND REMEMBER YOU REPRESENT THE PEOPLE NOT YOURSELF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government acts as a dictatorship,it is doing a terrible job of running OUR country it is popular opinion that it does not listen to the public,over taxes us and lies to us over the european union,floods our country with imigrants to destroy british identity,and introduces stupid unesassary  red tape and legislation,new labour are a disgrace more like a communist regime then a democracy,EITHER LISTEN OR CALL AN ELECTION you represent the british people not yourselves.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
